lead_paragraph: The South Korean electronics giant may create a holding company structure after an American hedge fund called for the company to shake up its operations.

headline.print_headline: Samsung Electronics, Pushed by Investors, Will Consider Restructuring
headline.main: Samsung Electronics, Pushed by Investors, Will Consider Restructuring

snippet: The South Korean electronics giant may create a holding company structure after an American hedge fund called for the company to shake up its operations....
abstract: Samsung Electronics says it is considering reorganization of its vast operations as way to maximize company's value; review comes after Elliott Management, American hedge fund and Samsung shareholder, had been pressuring family-controlled South Korean firm to restructure, asserting electronics giant's troubles went beyond recall of its Galaxy Note 7 smartphone.
